p. p. von mauser.gloss: German arms manufacturer and inventor of a repeating rifle and pistol (1838-1914)

ppk.gloss: a Marxist-Leninist terrorist group of Kurds trying to establish an independent Kurdish state in eastern Turkey

pplo.gloss: a mycoplasma resistant to antibiotics that causes a kind of pneumonia in humans

ppp.gloss: surgical resection of unnecessary palatal and oropharyngeal tissue to open the airway
